alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cool front will move southeast across eastern Kiowa, eastern Bent and northern Prowers county through 6:30 pm. There is a possibility of a brief landspout or two with any convection along this cool front. At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and a thunderstorm or two along a line extending from near Towner to near Hasty. Movement was east at 35 mph. There is a possibility of a landspout or two could form with this boundary as it moves across the region. HAZARD...One or two Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Towner around 605 PM MDT. Wiley around 615 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lamar. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
